channel.title: [PI] Skill Cape System
channel.description:
Well today on my server I introduced the Cape of Mastery and the requirements are:
Ok If you saw the thread few mins ago, just ignore it...more easy i'll make it for you to answer my question :)
How do I add requirments for an item. For my Mastery Cape, need all 99 skills except for fishing,smith,fletch (messed up skills, will be trying to fix them) and 100M XP in att, str, hp..
Thanks,
Heinz
